bike.description: FACT 11m carbon, 29" geometry, FACT IS construction, tapered HT, carbon PF30 BB, hollow carbon dropouts, replaceable alloy derailleur hanger

components.description: Custom RockShox SID World Cup 29 Brain, inertia valve damper, air spring, tapered carbon steerer, top-mount Brain Fade adj. and rebound adj., QR, S: 80mm travel, Others 90mm
1-1/8 and 1.5" Threadless, Campy style upper with 1.5" lower, cartridge bearings, carbon top cap
32.6mm clamp size, 7050 hard anodized alloy collar, single ti bolt
Protective clear coat, derailleur hanger, owners manual
